subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Theory of Change: Mapping the Path to Impact
description: Learn Theory of Change: Mapping the Path to Impact in one minute.

hook.text: Imagine building a house with no blueprints. That's how many social ventures launchâ€”good intentions, no map.

buildup.text: A theory of change is the blueprint. It maps every step from your activity to the impact you promise.

discovery.text: It forces hard questions: What assumptions are you making? What could break your entire logic chain?

twist.text: The Harlem Children's Zone used a detailed theory of change to send 97% of its students to college.

climax.text: Today funders demand theories of change before writing checks. Hope alone no longer opens wallets.

punchline.text: Good intentions need a map to become real results.

quiz.question: What is a theory of change in social entrepreneurship?
options: A political philosophy about how societies evolve over time
A step-by-step map connecting activities to intended social impact
A mathematical formula for predicting stock market changes
